extendedInfo.description: CAUTION: USE THIS APP AT YOUR OWN RISKâ Do *NOT* install if bookmark synchronization is enabled in the Google "Account Sync" settingsâ Built-in Â«RestoreÂ» will most likely fail if bookmark sync is enabledâ This app only works with the default browser (WebKit) bookmarks. *NO* Chrome, Firefox or Opera bookmarks support. The app will fail if the default browser is disabled.â Back up your bookmarks before playing with this app!Bookmark Folders lets you organize your browser bookmarks into folders - ad free and open source. Usage:â¢ Short-click to expand/collapse folders and open linksâ¢ Long-click to edit links and define the folder structureFeatures:â¢ Integrated bookmark backup and restore, including auto backupâ¢ Create home screen shortcut for bookmark using the "favicon"Limitations: â¢ Folders only work within the app. Within the browser, the bookmark list will still be "plain". This app is open source, hosted here: https://dynamicg-android-apps2.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/BookmarkTree

reviews.title: Works with the HTC One browser
reviews.comment: I recently switched from an iPhone to an HTC One and needed to move my bookmarks from the iphone over to the HTC.  It would have been easy to do that using Chrome or Firefox with their built-in bookmark synching options. However, I wanted to stick with the stock Android browser.  I ended up using icloud on the PC to sync my old iphone bookmarks to IE. Then I used the HTC sync software to sync the bookmarks from IE to the HTC. Finally I needed this app to organize them on the HTC.  Apparently the browser on the HTC One is a customized version of the stock android browser.  This app works fine with it.
reviews.author: Scott Harris

reviews.title: Abandoned
reviews.comment: It\'s all out of whack now. It\'s impossible to change the view. No longer has grid view. That\'s unfortunate. This app has also not been updated for quite sometime. Perhaps abandoned.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I don\'t rate many applications.  This app is great.  Some of the configuration options could use a rearrangement and the default delimiter is bad.  I use -/ as my delimiter  It doesn\'t work with Chrome.  When it does, this app will get another star.  Yah, I know I already gave it five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t show high level folders
reviews.comment: I do see several levels of folders in the stock browser (and in the Chrome also). But this app apparently strips all high level folders showing me subfolders only. What\'s a pity...
reviews.author: Yuri Volkov

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: Easy to use, great app for organizing what used to be a chore. Nice work! Highly recommended. (04/22/13 update) I still am unable to use the BACKUP to GOOGLE DRIVE option which doesn\'t make me happy. I em\'d dev & they responded a day later w/several try tips: reboot/retry, check firewall/antivirus is not blocking their app, try WiFi or 3G & vice versa, but nothing corrects this problem. I\'m a \"if the app offers the option-it should work\" so am backing off 1 star till this is resolved.
reviews.author: Sherry Swecker

reviews.title: awesome! very useful
reviews.comment: finally an easy way to save bookmarks to all devices! Please add a light background GUI and if possible and an app to SD function, which would greatly help for lower end devices. I love the ability to backup to Gdrive. A drop box function would also be great, for it has an simpler interface than Gdrive. Keep up the good work. PS you can import your bookmark settings to other browsers from the stock browser.
reviews.author: Tony Pitrucelle

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Very nice
reviews.author: vinit jadhao

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The app does as it says it does. It makes saving and organising bookmarks neat and tidy. It made switching phones so easy and simple. I don\'t need it anymore since my new phone has a great organsier though

reviews.title: Update.
reviews.comment: This App doesn\'t look nothing like the pictures here. On my Android 2.2 it\'s basic. & of you aleast add a Synce features & import bookmarks from default & other browsers it will greatly help this App.

reviews.title: So this is no longer called Bookmark Tree?
reviews.comment: I had to reinstall it on a replacement phone (same model), and when I loaded the most recent Bookmark backup file, it was all messed up. None of my folders were remembered, some bookmarks are mistaken for folders. A couple hours of editing ahead for me.
reviews.author: David Gow
